page.title: 08Childrens Games
page.content: The game I like best is rounders the other games I like are cricket, netball and bulldog. The most popular thing in the school is rounders. You have to be quite a fast runner to be good at rounders. 15 people like playing cricket, 26 like playing rounders, 4 like playing bulldog and 2 like playing netball. 10 like playing football 3 like playing hopscotch, 7 like playing hide and seek and 8 like playing leapfrog best. My hobby is pony riding and looking after ponies. I have my own pony she is a 13.2hh bay mare 8 years. I have had her 3 months. She has been shod twice. I keep her at Court Drive. She stays in her stable at night because the Geldings go out at night. When the Geldings come in in the morning the mares go out. In the winter they go out together. EMMA GAFFNEY
